text: Poligny is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department and Provence-Alpes-CÃ´te d'Azur region in southeastern France. == Geography == Despite being in the Alps, the northern commune area is relatively flat, as the commune is in a valley. The southern part of the commune is much hillier. == Transport == === Road === The D17, D217A and D817 roads pass through the village of Poligny. The N85 by-passes the village but still enters the commune. == Population == == References == Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Poligny, Hautes-Alpes
